ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC! Fan favorite Crossed writer, SIMON SPURRIER, delivers another fantastic character drama to the Crossed universe with "American Quitters." What do a hardcore biker and a hippie have in common? In the bleak landscape of the Crossed they have become traveling buddies giving us the strangest bloody violent road trip ever. Errol and Frank are the odd couple of the apocalypse and they have only one goal on this crazy road trip...to kill as many Crossed as they can before they die.
Available with a Regular, Torture, Wraparound, and special Red Crossed Incentive covers by Rafael Ortiz.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/crossed-badlands-37/4000-427722/
